----- Original Message -----
From: "Seairth Jacobs" <seairth@...>



> Not knowing a lot about the various options out there, is there an
interface
> description language that is being used to describe RESTful interfaces?
>
> Ideally, I'd like to describe the allowed format of request entities, but
> that's a tall order, I'm sure.  So, any pointers?  Suggestions?
>
There was some mail a while ago on this - its a recurring issue.
Let's start a Wiki page on it & harvest the email list archives for the
alternate suggestions & use cases.
